Title: Joy Comes in the Morning
Writer: Shedrick Cortez-Stokes (story by), Shedrick Cortez-Stokes (story), Norman Ray Fitts, Norman Ray Fitts
Actors: Victoria Mast, Rose Marie Cavanna, Michael Basil, Nicole Cano
Plot: Joy Comes In the Morning, depicts the life changing events brought on by cancer involving the mother and daughter (authors) and then showcases several other case histories of people sharing the same disease.
